013    package net.sf.oval.expression;
014    
015    import java.util.Map;
016    import java.util.Map.Entry;
017    
018    import net.sf.oval.exception.ExpressionEvaluationException;
019    import net.sf.oval.internal.Log;
020    import bsh.EvalError;
021    import bsh.Interpreter;
022    
023    /**
024     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
025     */
026    public class ExpressionLanguageBeanShellImpl implements ExpressionLanguage
027    {
028            private static final Log  LOG = Log.getLog(ExpressionLanguageBeanShellImpl.class);
029    
030            /**
031             * {@inheritDoc}
032             */
033            public Object evaluate(final String expression, final Map<String, ? > values) throws ExpressionEvaluationException
034            {
035                    try
036                    {
037                            final Interpreter interpreter = new Interpreter();
038                            interpreter.eval("setAccessibility(true)"); // turn off access restrictions
039                            for (final Entry<String, ? > entry : values.entrySet())
040                            {
041                                    interpreter.set(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
042                            }
043                            LOG.debug("Evaluating BeanShell expression: {1}", expression);
044                            return interpreter.eval(expression);
045                    }
046                    catch (final EvalError ex)
047                    {
048                            throw new ExpressionEvaluationException("Evaluating script with BeanShell failed.", ex);
049                    }
050            }
051    
052            /**
053             * {@inheritDoc}
054             */
055            public boolean evaluateAsBoolean(final String expression, final Map<String, ? > values)
056                            throws ExpressionEvaluationException
057            {
058                    final Object result = evaluate(expression, values);
059    
060                    if (!(result instanceof Boolean))
061                            throw new ExpressionEvaluationException("The script must return a boolean value.");
062                    return (Boolean) result;
063            }
064    }
